    • actionPerformed

      public void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
      listener that manage the file selection using the JFileChooser and provide the row creation. add the created row to the job list in the JobPanel's JTable. The selected files have to be added one by one in the job list. This file will be encrypted/compressed and splitted.
      Specified by:
      actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
